Dm_ZO_0021_06: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Determination_00>Link! You see it, do you not?
Dm_ZO_0021_02:
That is surely the source of the sludge.
I am certain of it.
Dm_ZO_0021_07: If we could only make use of that water...
Dm_ZO_0021_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Puzzled_00>How magnificent... To think that such a
structure was floating in the sky above
our own Zora's Domain!
